meta.dc:subject: legislation
meta.dc:rights: the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

main.docTitle: Closed Area (Hong Kong Section of the Shenzhen Bay Bridge and Deep Bay Link Portion) Order

section.name: s2
section.heading: Declaration of closed area
section.content: The area enclosed by the boundaries set out in Part 1 of the Schedule (the Area) is declared to be a closed area.

section.name: s1
section.heading: Horizontal boundaries
section.leadIn: The horizontal boundaries of the Area are the outermost left and right edge lines of—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the Hong Kong section of the Shenzhen Bay Bridge which is described as such and shown stippled black on the map set out in Part 2; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the Deep Bay Link Portion which is described as such and shown coloured grey on the map set out in Part 2.

subsection.leadIn: The upper vertical boundary of the Area is—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: in relation to the Hong Kong section of the Shenzhen Bay Bridge referred to in section 1(a), set at an elevation of +165 mPD (metres above Hong Kong Principal Datum); and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: in relation to the Deep Bay Link Portion referred to in section 1(b), set at an elevation of +60 mPD (metres above Hong Kong Principal Datum).

subsection.leadIn: The lower vertical boundary of the Area is—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: in relation to the Hong Kong section of the Shenzhen Bay Bridge referred to in section 1(a), the bottom parallel edge lines of the bridge box girders; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: in relation to the Deep Bay Link Portion referred to in section 1(b), set at 4 m below the road surface.

img.alt: This image is the map of the closed area comprising the Hong Kong section of the Shenzhen Bay Bridge and the Deep Bay Link Portion.
img.title: This image is the map of the closed area comprising the Hong Kong section of the Shenzhen Bay Bridge and the Deep Bay Link Portion.
